metadata.name: So many cards
metadata.description:
[h1]"Do you like cards ?[/h1] -Yes !
[h1]Do you REALLY like cards ?[/h1] -Huh...yes ...?"
[b][u]THIS MOD IS MADE FOR YOU !!![/u][/b]
[b]The mod add 46 differents brand new cards with fun and crazy effects ![/b]
[b][i]Since the mod includes an external item description support, all the description of the cards are in game ![/i][/b]
[h1]Items and trinket ?[/h1] The mod also add 2 uniques and very special items and a trinket.
[i]Bugs:[/i] If you found a bug, comment about it and I'll try to fix it as soon as possible !
[u]The code has been made by caimez_ All sprites have been made by Luxtro39[/u]
